metadata.title: CVE-2018-20871 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: In Univa Grid Engine before 8.6.3, when configured for Docker jobs and execd spooling on root_squash, weak file permissions ("other" write access) occur in certain cases (GE-6890).

criterions.comment: gridengine package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
